content: a handmade crochet baby blanket is warm cozy and practical more than that it s a treasured keepsake for your little one or a cherished gift that any new parent would appreciate in this article learn how to crochet a quick and easy baby blanket with a colorful ripple pattern we ll teach you everything you need to crochet a baby blanket even if it s your first time and walk you through the free pattern step-by-step **finished size ** 30 in by 36 in **gauge ** 19 stitches in half_double_crochet-blo ripple pattern = 4 in 10cm or 2 pattern repeats 24 sts total = 5 in 12 5 cm when you match the gauge your project will be the same size as described in the pattern
